cast.overview: While hiding from bullies in his school's attic, a young boy discovers the extraordinary land of Fantasia, through a magical book called The Neverending Story. The book tells the tale of Atreyu, a young warrior who, with the help of a luck dragon named Falkor, must save Fantasia from the destruction of The Nothing.
cast.title: The NeverEnding Story

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Noah Leslie Hathaway (born November 13, 1971 in Los Angeles, California) is an American former child actor. He is best known for his role as Atreyu in 80s film The Neverending Story and for portraying Boxey on the original TV Series Battlestar Galactica.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Noah Hathaway, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Noah Hathaway
